name: AwkwardFacts
0:
”Alexa, open awkward facts”
”Alexa, open awkward facts and tell me a fact”
”Alexa, ask awkward facts to get a fact”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: awkward facts
des: Your daily dose of awkwardness. Increase your knowledge by asking me a fact which is as awkward as a human being. Fact ranges from all the genres and it will make sure to leave you surprised.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
